--- Page 1 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2022/0171 b) Date of Occurrence: 18/04/2023
c) Installation Details: Eagle Vision-9 - AC-4293-595 at
Sector West Station
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Propulsion b) Date Component 23/04/2023
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Compressor Section d) Main Assembly: Bay-1
e) Nomenclature: Compressor Section Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: Standard
g) Part No.: PR-9216-O1 h) Sl No.: SN-4310-322
i) Firmware Version: Not Applicable j) Software Version: Not Applicable
k) Date of Installation: 20/04/2021 l) Date of Removal: 21/04/2023
Pg No: 12 Ln No: 30 Pg No: 64 Ln No: 9
m) Manufacturing Agency: Meridian Aviation Industries n) Date, Month & Year July 2015
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: Yes p) Whether under AMC Yes
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 4371 Hrs / 202 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Oil consumption rate increase. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Compressor Section component.
Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 02/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit.
Date: 03/05/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome.
Date: 06/05/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable.
Date: 06/05/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable.
Date: 12/05/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
